name: MainStory_Chapter1
description: A train running through the underground, conversations about children and God, sudden sreech of brakes. Chapter one completed. The story begins!

name: MainStory_Chapter2
description: What is there, inside the chest? Who are those people after your cargo? Chapter two completed.

name: MainStory_Chapter3
description: It's so damp and calm here, only the humming of machines disturbs the silence. Nobody is here. Just the machines and a dead body. Chapter three completed.

name: MainStory_Chapter4
description: An ordinary elevator trip is hardly exciting. But not today. And not with this particular companion. Chapter four completed.

name: PeoplesPatrol_Chapter3
description: To hell with those smugglers! You can get your reward right now. I mean, you could... Chapter three of "People's patrol" route is completed.

name: PeoplesPatrol_Chapter4
description: So, this is the end. That wasn't exactly what you had expected. Chapter four of "People's patrol" route is completed.

name: ControlRoom_AllCoins
description: Somebody has lived here, in this room with machines. And he left a bunch of gold stashes around. It seems you've found them all.

name: RedDress_Chapter5
description: A chance meeting in the elevator becomes a first step into the alien world of the aristocracy. The fifth chapter on the "Red Dress" route complete.

name: Reported_inquirers_body_in_control_room
description: Down there, in the deep, there is a corpse of a woman in Inquirer's uniform. It was your duty to report it.
